text: Gregory Ruffin is an American football coach. He is the head football coach at Edward Waters College in Jacksonville, Florida, a position he has held since the 2018 season. Ruffin previously served as the head football coach at Shaw University in Raleigh, North Carolina (2002), Paine College in Augusta, Georgia (2014), and Texas College in Tyler, Texas (2016). ==Head coaching record== ===Club=== ===Varsity=== ==References== ==External links== * Bethune Cookman profile Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American football fullbacks Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Benedict Tigers football coaches Category:Edward Waters Tigers football coaches Category:Jackson State Tigers football coaches Category:Lane Dragons football players Category:Lincoln Blue Tigers football coaches Category:Ouachita Baptist Tigers football coaches Category:Paine Lions football coaches Category:Shaw Bears football coaches Category:Texas College Steers football coaches Category:Texas Southern Tigers football coaches Category:Tuskegee Golden Tigers football coaches Category:High school football coaches in Missouri Category:High school football coaches in Tennessee Category:Jackson State University alumni Category:African-American coaches of American football Category:African-American players of American football
title: Greg Ruffin
